DOC.detailed_description: Study Title UK Post-Market Clinical Follow-Up Of The INFINITY® Total Ankle System Study Design Prospective , multi-site , multi-year post-market clinical follow-up study Study Group Primary/Unilateral and/or bilateral Total Ankle Arthroplasty subject implant INFINITY® Total Ankle System N Subjects 500 10 site Follow-Up Schedule Subject enrollment consist Pre-operative , Operative , 6 month , 1 yr. , 2 yr. , 5yr. , 7 yr. , 10 yr. , unscheduled visit need . Primary Objective Evaluate long-term survivorship INFINITY® implant 10 year Secondary Objective ( ) Secondary objective assess : - Identify ass implant component loosen and/or subsidence , osteolysis and/or cyst formation radiographic evaluation early throughout lifetime implant . - Compare improvement self-reported pain social interaction quality life measure pre-op 10 year post operatively ; assess EuroQol ( EQ5D5L ) . - Compare pain functional improvement Ankle Osteoarthritis Score ( AOS ) , visual analogue scale specifically design modification Foot Function Index . - Compare improvement self-reported pain-free function score pre-op 10 year post-operatively , assess Manchester Oxford Foot Questionnaire ( MOXFQ ) walking/standing score . - Identify report safety implant term complication adverse event . Inclusion Criteria Subjects include study must meet following criterion : - Be 21 year age time surgery ; - Diagnosed unilateral and/or bilateral ankle joint disease ; - Diagnosed ankle joint damage rheumatoid arthritis , post-traumatic , degenerative arthritis ; Willing able consent participate ( write , informed consent / witness verbal consent ) Willing able attend request follow-up visit ; - Subjects determine Investigator appropriate candidate INFINITY® Total Ankle System Exclusion Criteria Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : - Subjects ankle condition , determine investigator , inappropriate candidate total ankle replacement ; - Subjects require revision total ankle replacement ankle consider study
